supportedUseCase:
This board contains several widgets:

- A list of firewalls (e.g. network ACLs, security groups) allowing Internet access
- A matrix table showing the ingress/egress access and allowed ports from/to an external network, including the internet
- A matrix table showing the ingress/egress access and allowed ports between internal networks
- A list of expired certificates
- A list of DNS records not pointing to an internal resource
- A list of domains/subdomains

queries.name: query0
queries.query:
FIND Firewall AS src
  THAT allows AS r
  Network with public=true or _source='system-mapper' AS dst
RETURN
  concat(src.tag.AccountName, ' | ', src.displayName) AS x,
  concat(dst.tag.AccountName, ' | ', dst.displayName) AS y,
  r.egress AS egress,
  r.ingress AS ingress,
  r.fromPort as fromPort,
  r.toPort as toPort,
  r.ipProtocol AS protocol

queries.name: query0
queries.query:
FIND Firewall AS src
  THAT allows AS r
  Network with public!=true AS dst
RETURN
  concat(src.tag.AccountName, ' | ', src.displayName) AS x,
  concat(dst.tag.AccountName, ' | ', dst.displayName) AS y,
  r.egress AS egress,
  r.ingress AS ingress,
  r.fromPort as fromPort,
  r.toPort as toPort,
  r.ipProtocol AS protocol

queries.name: query0
queries.query:
FIND Firewall AS src
  THAT allows AS r
  Internet AS dst
RETURN

  dst.displayName AS y,
  r.egress AS egress,
  r.ingress AS ingress,
  r.fromPort as fromPort,
